channel.title: HELP! - Prayer needs fixing and looting
channel.description:
[center]My Runescape private server is 562 loading 663+.
Prayer does not have a limit it will simply never run out and always displays '0' as the amount of prayer points. Does anyone know how to fix this? If not I'm not too bothered.
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2m34lte.png[/img]
Second, looting within the server doesn't work; the player cannot click the item and then run and loot, I have to 'walk here' then pick up the item. Again, if anybody knows the fix please help!
[IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2ni8zf7.png[/img]
[/center]

[center]My Runescape private server is 562 loading 663+.
